titles.title: Satellite and Cable Access Act of 2006
A bill to provide certain counties with the ability to receive television broadcast signals of their choice.
Satellite and Cable Access Act of 2006

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: Satellite and Cable Access Act of 2006 - Amends federal copyright law and the Communications Act of 1934 to allow certain counties and areas to receive broadcast transmissions of network televsion stations located in the capital of the state in which such counties and areas are located.
